alert.note: Alert for Dent; Douglas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 09 at 8:18AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Residual flooding will continue into this afternoon from yesterdays heavy rainfall. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Missouri, including the following counties, in south central Missouri, Dent, Howell, Oregon, Shannon and Texas. In southwest Missouri, Douglas, Ozark, Taney, Webster and Wright. * WHEN...Until 415 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 816 AM CST, Minor flooding will continue across the area from yesterdays heavy rain. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... West Plains, Mountain Grove, Ava, Mountain View, Willow Springs, Houston, Licking, Cabool, Seymour, Mansfield, Gainesville, Norwood, Hartville, Summersville, Raymondville, Diggins, Bakersfield, Dawson, Pomona, Duncan, Theodosia, South Fork, Pontiac, Brandsville, Huggins, Wasola, Sundown, Vanzant, Drury, Gentryville, Dora, Brushyknob, Rockbridge, Siloam Springs, Brixey, Sycamore, Bendavis, Zanoni, Elk Creek and Graff. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
